title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8031.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8031.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) IR 81. The
northbound and southbound roadways of IR 81 between the Cortland-Onondaga
county line and the Onondaga-Oswego county line in the City of Syracuse, Village of North Syracuse, Towns of Tully, LaFayette, Onondaga, Salina, Clay, Cicero and the Onondaga Indian Reservation. (b) IR 481. The northbound and southbound
roadways of IR 481 between IR 81, exit 16A, and IR 81, exit 29, in the Towns of

Onondaga, DeWitt and Cicero. (c) IR
690. The eastbound and westbound roadways of IR 690 between Thruway exit 39 and
IR 481 in the City of Syracuse and Village of East Syracuse and the Towns of

Van Buren, Camillus, Geddes and DeWitt. (d) Route 690. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Route 690 between IR 690 and Route 370 in the Towns of Van Buren
and Lysander. (e) Route 481. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Route 481 between IR 81 and the

Onondaga-Oswego county line in the Village of North Syracuse and Town of

Clay. (f) IR 90. The eastbound and
westbound roadways of IR 90 between the Cayuga-Onondaga county line and the

Onondaga-Madison county line in the towns of Elbridge, Van Buren, Clay, Salina, DeWitt and Manlius. (g) Route 695. Route 695 between IR 690 and Route 5, Camillus bypass, in the Towns of Camillus
and Geddes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8031.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
